attributes.action: Increase fines and jail sentences for animal cruelty, including dog fighting
attributes.additional_details: We  can't allow animal cruelty to slip through the net. Anyone who harms an animal must be accountable.
attributes.background: The RSPA received 5000 calls re dog fighting in last few years, the tip of an iceburg. Yet if found guilty, offenders maximum prison sentence is 6 months. An insult. To to stop these horrific ordeals to fighting dogs and animals used as bait, sentences especially and fines must be greatly increased.
